/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand tall on both sides of the street, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The street itself is devoid of any human presence or vehicles, adding to the tranquility of the scene. In the distance, a body of water can be seen, its calm surface reflecting the muted colors of the surroundings. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
